entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
Temperature: 4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 24 %
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of snow beginning after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
